email_address.description: Email address for contacting the candidate.
email_address.title: Email Address

phone_number.description: Phone number for contacting the candidate.
phone_number.title: Phone Number

willing_to_relocate.description: Indicates if the candidate is open to relocating for the job.
willing_to_relocate.title: Willing To Relocate

field_of_study.description: Major or field of study of the candidate.
field_of_study.title: Field Of Study

company_name.description: Name of the company where the candidate was employed.
company_name.title: Company Name

position_title.description: Job title held by the candidate.
position_title.title: Position Title

start_date.description: Date when the candidate started the position.
start_date.title: Start Date

end_date.description: Date when the candidate ended the position or null if currently employed.
end_date.title: End Date

technologies_used.description: List of technologies the candidate utilized in this role.
technologies_used.title: Technologies Used

team_scale.description: Size of the team the candidate was involved with.
team_scale.title: Team Scale

project_descriptions.description: Descriptions of projects the candidate worked on.
project_descriptions.title: Project Descriptions

skill_name.description: Name of the programming language, framework, or technology.
skill_name.title: Skill Name

proficiency_level.description: Proficiency level of the candidate in the given skill.
proficiency_level.title: Proficiency Level

project_name.description: Name or title of the project.
project_name.title: Project Name

role.description: Role of the candidate in the project.
role.title: Role

project_url.description: URL link to the project or its repository (if applicable).
project_url.title: Project Url

recognitions.description: Awards or acknowledgments received for the project.
recognitions.title: Recognitions

communication.description: Ability of the candidate to communicate effectively.
communication.title: Communication

teamwork.description: Capacity of the candidate to work collaboratively with others.
teamwork.title: Teamwork

leadership.description: Experience and ability in leading teams or mentoring individuals.
leadership.title: Leadership

flexibility.description: Adaptability of the candidate to changes and new challenges.
flexibility.title: Flexibility

technical_strength.description: Technical competency rating of the candidate, on a scale from 1 to 5.
technical_strength.title: Technical Strength

alignment_with_needs.description: How well the candidate's experience aligns with the organization's needs.
alignment_with_needs.title: Alignment With Needs

growth_potential.description: Assessment of the candidate's potential for growth within the company.
growth_potential.title: Growth Potential

interview_insights.description: Additional insights gathered from interviews (if applicable).
interview_insights.title: Interview Insights

hiring_recommendation.description: Overall recommendation regarding the hiring of the candidate.
hiring_recommendation.title: Hiring Recommendation

concerns.description: Concerns or red flags identified during the evaluation process.
concerns.title: Concerns

source.description: Source where the candidate was discovered (e.g., referral, job board).
source.title: Source

application_date.description: Date when the candidate applied for the position.
application_date.title: Application Date

handler.description: Person or team responsible for handling the candidate's application.
handler.title: Handler

current_stage.description: Current stage of the recruitment process for the candidate.
current_stage.title: Current Stage

pipeline_efficiency.description: Performance metric on how efficiently the candidate is progressing through the recruitment stages.
pipeline_efficiency.title: Pipeline Efficiency

basic_information.description: Basic personal information and contact details of the candidate.

education.description: Details about the candidate's educational background.
education.title: Education

professional_experience.description: Comprehensive history of the candidate's past professional roles and achievements.
professional_experience.title: Professional Experience

technical_capabilities.description: Skills and technologies the candidate is proficient in.
technical_capabilities.title: Technical Capabilities

project_work.description: Important projects the candidate has contributed to or led.
project_work.title: Project Work

soft_skills.description: Assessment of the candidate's interpersonal and communications skills.

evaluation.description: Evaluation details and hiring recommendations for the candidate.

recruitment_process_details.description: Operational details regarding the candidate's recruitment process.
